attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCC8R8enCYcAsYay75O_description
attribs.current:
[[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]]

These numbers may be arranged in any order.
If you dont like these stats you may do 27-point buy with this calculator: http://1-dot-encounter-planner.appspot.com/point-buy-calculator.html

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCC8zXWnXUzinvvkxqo_description
attribs.current:
Make a token on http://rolladvantage.com/tokenstamp/ upload the token as your character image, and change the character name with this format:

PC Name (Game ID)

This is so the character can be assigned to you and a token can be made even while you are offline. if you fail to follow these instructions the character will eventually get deleted.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LCickHm6D4hx98qusW6_spelldescription
attribs.current: Before the spell ends, the touched creature can roll 1d4 and add the result to any one ability check.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LCifrKnd6GLAAFYipx1_spelldescription
attribs.current: The club or quatrestaff becomes magical for the duration. You can use your spellcasting modifier instead of strength for attack and damage rolls with the weapon for the duration, and the damage die becomes a 1d8.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LCnRNuefd1xnvQoPMcx_spelldescription
attribs.current: A creature of your choice that you can see within range is healed 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier hit points. This has no effect on undead or constructs,.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LEeTnHya-UGAq6aXllj_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: a drop of water or peice of ice

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LEeTnHya-UGAq6aXllj_spelldescription
attribs.current: You create a shard of ice and fling it at one creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 piercing damage. Hit or miss, the shard explodes. The target and each creature within 5 feet of the point where the ice knife exploded must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 2d6 cold damage.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LCifrKnd6GLAAFYipx1_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: mistletoe, a shamrock leaf, and a quatrestaff

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LEec4ZJJM6-yTs6mqHp_atk_desc
attribs.current: The target and each creature within 5 feet of the point where the ice knife exploded must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 2d6 cold damage.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LEenLirVwDOZGUlyfCt_description
attribs.current: As part of a short rest, you can harvest bone and hide from a slain beast, construct, dragon, monstrosity, or plant creature of size small or larger to create one of the following items: a shield, a club, a javelin, or 1d4 darts or blowgun needles. To use this trait, you need a blade, such as a dagger, or appropriate artisan's tools, such as leatherworker's tools.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LEepR3fmlp6oq79f-HE_description
attribs.current: You can hold your breath for up to 15 minutes at a time.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LEeptocC79sqpRfUSKn_description
attribs.current: You have tough, scaly skin. When you aren't wearing armor, your AC is 13 + your Dexterity modifier. You can use your natural armor to determine your AC if the armor you wear would leave you with a lower AC. A shield's benefits apply as normal while you use your natural armor.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LEeqHhkM7xaY6vcPWiS_description
attribs.current: In battle, you can throw yourself into a vicious feeding frenzy. As a bonus action, you can make a special attack with your bite. If the attack hits, it deals its normal damage, and you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier (minimum of 1), and you can't use this trait again until you finish a short or long rest.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LEeriCPRYA28XYE9bOP_description
attribs.current: You can always find a place to perform, usually in an inn or tavern but possibly with a circus, at a theater, or even in a noble’s court. At such a place, you receive free lodging and food of a modest or comfortable standard (depending on the quality of the establishment), as long as you perform each night. In addition, your performance makes you something of a local figure. When strangers recognize you in a town where you have performed, they typically take a liking to you.

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: I will do anything for other members of my old troupe.

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: I'm addicted to illegal substances and will blow money to get them.

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: I'm only in it for the money and fame.

attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current: Whenever I come to a new place, I collect local rumours and spread gossip.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LEeyPujLTjkfOZ0DdvA_description
attribs.current:
When you choose this circle at 2nd level, you gain the ability to use Wild Shape on your turn as a bonus action, rather than as an action. 
Additionally, while you are transformed by Wild Shape, you can use a bonus action to expend one spell slot to regain 1d8 hit points per level of the spell slot expended

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LEeylyAL2fluXZo8XTo_description
attribs.current:
Starting at 2nd level, you can use your Wild Shape to transform into a beast with a challenge rating as high as 1, but must abide by the other limitations there. 
Starting at 6th level, you can transform into a beast with a challenge rating as high as your druid level divided by 3, rounded down.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LEezxNPUl7y5jmETZIB_description
attribs.current:
Armor Class 11
Hit Points 52 (8d10+8)
Speed 10 ft., swim 60 ft.

STR 17 (+3) 
DEX 13 (+1) 
CON 13 (+1)
Skills Perception +4, Stealth +5
Senses Darkvision 60 Ft., passive Perception 14

Hold Breath. While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 1 hour.
Underwater Camouflage. The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while underwater.
Water Breathing. The octopus can breathe only underwater.

Actions
Tentacles. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest). A 20-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LEf0RU2bEZMxGs7fKDL_atk_desc
attribs.current: On a hit, the target is grappled. DC16 strength check to break free and is restrined if grapple lasts to subsequent turns, but the creature can repeat the save using its action.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LEf2g71xuHbMzOLqVe3_description
attribs.current:
Armor Class 14 (Natural Armor)
Hit Points 26 (4d10+4)
Speed 30 ft., climb 30 ft.

STR 14 (+2) 
DEX 16 (+3) 
CON 12 (+1) 

Skills Stealth +7
Senses Blindsight 10 Ft., Darkvision 60 Ft., passive Perception 10

Spider Climb. The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
Web Sense. While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.
Web Walker. The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

Actions
Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus (2d8)poison damage. The target must make a dc on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

Web (Recharge 5-6). Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 30/60 ft., one creature. The target is restrained by webbing As an action, the restrained target can make a DC 12 Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage)

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LEf3TTcG0HOQBhVK22h_atk_desc
attribs.current: Target must ake a DC 11 Constitution throw forhalf poison damage,

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LEf5PzyqqJ7KLMaqc5Y_atk_desc
attribs.current: is restrained unless they make a DC 12 Strength check to break out of the webbing. Rechages on a 5-6.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LEiZ4OeZL4Q5u3D56q2_spelldescription
attribs.current: The spell captures some of the incoming energy, lessening it's effect on you and storing it for your next melee attack. You have resistance to the triggering damage until the start of your next turn. Also, the first time you hit with a melee ttack on your turn, the target takes an additional 1d6 of the triggering damage type.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LEia3YOmhnf2DY4Bddd_spelldescription
attribs.current: All objects in a 20-foot cube are outlined in blue, green, o violet light. Any creatures in this area are also outlined, unless they succeed on a Dexterity saving throw. Attacks made against outlined creatures are made wirth advantages and outlinedcreatures do not benefit from invisibility.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LEibdfHi3zb6VGGHq2h_spelldescription
attribs.current: A creature you touch is healed a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting modifier. It has no effects on constructs or undead.
